comments.body: This should be replaced. Please see this PR ( https://github.com/conda-forge/thrift-cpp-feedstock/pull/4 ) for how to change this.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +5,9 @@if [[ `uname` == 'Darwin' ]]; then
    export CPPFLAGS="${CPPFLAGS} -DBOOST_NO_CXX11_RVALUE_REFERENCES"
fi

export CFLAGS="${CFLAGS} -pthread"
